title: Litecoin (LTC) Achieves Milestone in Payment Transactions as Halving Event Approaches
description: In a significant milestone for the cryptocurrency industry, Litecoin (LTC), one of the most prominent digital currencies, has achieved an All-Time High (ATH) in payment transactions.
